noUnsafeFinally.description:
Description

Disallow control flow statements in finally blocks.
JavaScript suspends the control flow statements oftryandcatchblocks until
the execution of finally block finishes. So, whenreturn,throw,breakorcontinueis used in finally, control flow statements insidetryandcatchare overwritten,
which is considered as unexpected behavior.
noUnsafeFinally.option: This rule has no specific options.
